title: Not necessarily the norm
author: VD
content_html:
From the Daily Telegraph: “In a survey of 1231 societies, only 186 were wholly monogamous.”

Given this, it seems hard to argue that an expansion of the state concept regarding the nouns will not eventually encompass the adjectives.
content_text:
From
the Daily Telegraph
:  “In a survey of 1231 societies, only 186 were wholly monogamous.”
Given this, it seems hard to argue that an expansion of the state concept regarding the nouns will not eventually encompass the adjectives.
